0.description: This is the room of Junk. How did you get here?

lockpickwire.description: A thin wire that lock pickers can USE to pick locks.
lockpickwire.reason: initially the lock pick isn't here, it is in the junk room

frontdoorkey.description: A large heavy key perfect for unlocking large heavy locks.
frontdoorkey.reason: initially the key isn't here, it is in the junk room

1.description: You are in front of a house. It is a small house. A scary house. The door to the house (in the north) is locked with a very strong padlock.

very_strong_padlock.examineDescription: The lock is very strong. Much stronger than all the practice lock picks that I bought from the hardware store. Those locks I could pick in a few minutes. This one. I doubt it can be picked at all.
very_strong_padlock.reason: examine padlock - but padlock is 'hidden' so you have to inspect element to find its id creating a 'real' but hidden object means I don't have to create any rules for examining

welcomemat.examineDescription: The welcome mat has the words 'Welcome Matt' on it. Presumeably this heavenly hovel from hell was once owned by a man named Matt. Sometimes people put spare keys under the mats. Do you think you could lift the mat and see?
welcomemat.reason: location object a 'welcome mat' examine the matt and you find a wire - I wonder if you can use wire to pick the lock? - no you can't

2.description: You are in the front garden of a house. It is a small house. A scary house. The garden is small. The garden is scary. For some reason the house has been built inside a Graveyard. A small graveyard. A very scary graveyard. You can hear things moving in the graveyard. Big things. Scary things.

mailbox.examineDescription: A wooden mailbox, although who would try to deliver mail here?

letter.examineDescription:
Dear Adventurer
I accidentally build my house in a graveyard and zombies try to eat me. Thanks for visiting. I hope you have a nice time here. I've locked the door so you'll probably want to find a key to try and get in.
Don't take too long, otherwise the zombies might eat you. Remember to inspect things and make sure you observe the writing in the game as there are clues there.
All the best,
Your friend Matt (even though we have never met).

PS. The graveyard is Easily Wandered through but you could get lost, So Seriously, Simply make a map

3.shortName: At the East side of the House
3.description: You are on the East side of the house. It is a small house. A scary house. etc. There is a window to the West but it is barred shut, there is no way that you or anyone, or any thing (say a Big Scary Thing that makes noise in the graveyard) could break through the barred window. You'd be safe in the house. You are not safe out here.

4.shortName: At the North side of the House
4.description: You are at back of the house. It is a small house. etc. graveyard etc. scary things moving etc. The back door is blocked. It looks as though someone bricked up the door, then covered it in wooden planks and then stuck bars over them. There is no way that you are going to go South into the house through that door. Actually it isn't really a door anymore. To call it a door is to call a brick wall a door, and that would be so wildly inaccurate that I wouldn't do that. Someone even built a small wall at the bottom of the wall, well actually it is more like a pile of stones but I call it a small wall, what would you call it?

living_death.description: You are dead. Living dead. The game doesn't end. But there is nothing you can do. You should probably just start the game again.
living_death.reason: We don't have death, so simulate it with a living death room with no exits

5.shortName: At the West side of the House
5.description: You are at the other side of the house. Unless of course this is the first side you have seen, in which case you are at the side of the house that is new to you. It is a small house in a graveyard with scary things which are scary. Are you scared? You should be. Someone has scratched something into the wood of the house, under the wood it looks like there is reinforced metal that once belonged on a tank.

scratchedwood.description: A Message Scratched into the wood
scratchedwood.examineDescription: Someone scratched a message into the wood, it says. 'Zombies love brains and hate drums, with love from Matt'. I guess the someone was Matt.

6.description: You are in the graveyard. A small graveyard. A very scary graveyard. You can hear things moving around in the graveyard. Big things. Scary things. The graveyard is very dark and everywhere looks the same. I'm concerned that if you don't get out of here and into the safety of the house soon you will very likely be eaten by one of the big scary things that you can hear in the graveyard.

7.description: You are in the graveyard. A small graveyard. With twisty routes between the graves.  You can hear things moving around in the graveyard. Are you lost?

8.description: You are in the graveyard. A small graveyard. This is the place of Voodoo where zombies are summoned and dispelled.

voodoodrum.examineDescription: This is a ceremonial voodoo drum used by expert voodoo practitioners to control zombies. It can only be used by Houngans or Mambos of great power. There is a sticker on the side that says 'use voodoodrum. scare zombies'.

inhouse.description: You are safely inside the house. It is quiet in here. And safe.

commands.parameters: lockpickwire:1
liftedmat:true
it occurs to you to lift the mat and look under it, you see a small wire. i wonder if you can use wire to pick the lock?
you lifted matt's mat

we already did that. ok. you lift the mat, wave it arround but nothing falls out. you roll it into a tube and peer through it, all you can see is a dark graveyard surrounding you and that reminds you that there are scary things there that might get you. you put the mat tube to your ear and that let's you hear even more loudly the things that are out there.
you lifted matt's mat again
what fun. since we all know that there are zombies walking about that want to eat your brains. let's play with stones instead of finding a way into this fortress called 'the house'.
you play with some stones
frontdoorkey:4
examinedsmallwall:true
pretty smart. you examined the small pile of stones that constitute a small wall. and it looks like you found a key.
you examine the small pile of stones
you already opened the mailbox. i'm not doing that again.
letter:false
openedmailbox:true
you open the mailbox and a letter falls to the ground.
you open the mailbox

7.reason: bug? 10:45 I think we can probably read the letter without opening the mailbox - leave bug in game do not fix

commands.parameters:
you hear zombies getting closer. one runs towards you. you fumble with the key.
you drop the key.
you hear a loud crescendo of music from somewhere, it is very dramatic.
the zombie falls over, giving you time to pick up the key and calmly unlock the door.
you walk inside and lock the door behind you. you accidentally drop the key in the house, where it promptly falls down a crack in the floor never to be seen again. ever.
i think that if matt ever comes back, then you just killed him. he won't be able to get in the house.
oh dear, never mind, on with the adventure.
inhouse
frontdoorkey:1
zombieattackhappening:false
you open the front door

11.reason: Use key to 'zap' into the house and lock the door behind you

commands.parameters: believing that since you are in an adventure game you have all your normal real world skills. and since in the real world you are an expert lock picker using wires that you found on the ground under old bits of cloth with words written on them. you stick the wire in the lock expecting it to open. but it doesn't. because you aren't in the real world now. you are in adventure game land. and there are zombies. and you can't. so the lock doesn't open. but you know now that you can't pick locks, so that's something.
you try to use the wire to pick the lock
letter:false
openedmailbox:true
you bash the mailbox like a primitive monkey and it opens and a letter falls to the ground. you could have probably opened it and received more points. you don't always have to force things.
you open the mailbox

11.reason: we can use the mailbox for less points, but if we open it then that is better

commands.parameters: useddrum:true
wow, you have mighty vodou powers. you can see zombies shuffling off into the darkness saying 'see ya, back soon'
zombieattack:0
you call upon the loa

11.reason: use drum for voodoo purposes  and cancel the zombie attack - score points for that

commands.parameters: you use your voudun powers. zombies shuffle off sighing 'ok dokey eat ya later'
zombieattack:0
you call upon the loa once more
did you notice that the door was locked with a strong padlock? that means you can't do that way

13.reason: North, can't go in, it is padlocked, we need to use the key

commands.parameters: yeah, i'm not sure you are reading the location descriptions. the clue was 'there is no way that you or anyone... could break through the barred window. you failed. you could not get through the barred window to the west.
not you. not a zombie. not a tank. not even a large green superhero who says 'smash' could go that way.
unless you are a very big tank. and i mean super big. like as big as a 'msc oscar'. you can't go that way

13.reason: we can't walk through the wall

commands.parameters: zombieattack:0
zombieattackhappening:true
zombieattack:1

turnConditions.reason: increment the zombie attack counter if it exists

commands.parameters: you heard moaning from the graveyard.
you heard an ominous silence. the graveyard is still. you feel something become aware of your presence.
you heard something moan. it sounded like it said 'brains'.
you heard something groan. it sounded like it said 'mmm, can smell tasty brains'.
you heard something wheeze. it sounded like it said 'oh, there, me can see tasty brain box'.
you heard something burble. it sounded like it said 'oh, there, me can see tasty brain box'.
you heard something shout loudly. it sounded like it said 'me open brain box now'.
you were attacked by a zombie and now you are dead.
living_death
zombieattackhappening:false

turnConditions.reason: you get killed by a zombie when counter reaches? 10 10 is the absolute minimum if you just go straight up and find the key and bring it back and do nothing else

welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Technical Web Testing Game
